paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

periodFinish.details: gets increased by 'rewardsDuration' everytime new rewards are added

reward.details: it should be te TAP token

Claimed(address,uint256).notice: event emitted when user claimed rewards

EmergencySave(address,uint256).notice: event emitted when some random tokens are withdrawn from the contract

OwnerUpdated(address,address).notice: event emitted when the new owner is updated

RewardAdded(uint256).notice: event emitted when new rewards were added to the pool

RewardsDurationUpdated(uint256).notice: event emitted when the rewards duration was updated

addRewards(uint256).notice: adds more rewards to the contract

balanceOf(address).notice: returns total invested amount for an user

deposit(uint256).notice: -- Write methods --locks token into the gauge

exit().notice: withdraws the entire investment and claims rewards

getRewardForDuration().notice: returns reward amount for a specific time range

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: returns the last time rewards were applicable

rewardsDuration().notice: returns the timespan when rewards are to be distributed

token().notice: returns the receipt token allowed for deposits

totalSupply().notice: -- View methods --returns the total deposited token supply

updateRewardDuration(uint256).notice: updates rewards duration with a new value

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: rewards paid to users so far
